runs.comm: bustles in and pins him in front first ball! Yamin takes a wicket with his first ball on debut! It was a good length, skidded on after hitting the seam and came whirring back at Roy, probably would have knocked out leg - no reviews in T20 so he has to go regardless
fuller, straighter, flicked sweetly towards midwicket where Jordan dives to make the save
pitched up, Root comes forward outside off and punches through the covers
fullish, reaches for it and mistimes into the covers
pitched up in the channel and Vince arrows a drive wide of deep cover for a couple
beats the bat, excellent line from Yamin, past the outside edge as Vince aimed an expansive drive down the ground
short and down the leg side, Rizwan dives and gets a hand on it but they run another
on the hips and clipped away through backward square for two

dropped by the bowler in his follow through! Tanvir again, he just got his left hand up in time and it hit the thumb, a forceful back-foot drive from Vince and it would have been a brilliant reflex catch. Not a comedy reel blooper like Tanvir's drop of Hales in the first match
punched towards mid-on and they take on the fielder, it would have been tight if the throw had hit
on the stumps, Root works the ball into a gap on the leg side for a couple more
driven hard towards backward point but Ahmed Shehzad makes an excellent sprawling stop
drops back and nudges one more off his hips
lovely stroke, full outside off and Root gets forward to drill and square drive to the fence
worked back towards mid-on
fired in straight and Root stays back to nudge the ball into the leg side again
inside-edge on to pad! Vince trying to force the ball down the ground, it ran to mid-on
angled in with the arm at 82mph, Root turns it to square leg
cracking stuff from Root, strikes this sweetly through midwicket, just a well-timed whip and it beats the diving fielder to run away for four
shortish outside off and Vince flails at it, gets a thick outside edge down towards third man but it lands short
back of a length, pushed across the right-hander, swing and a miss
short ball, Root cracks a pull into the stands! First-class delivery from England's poster boy postman
slower ball, punched back to the off side
launched over extra cover, Root's in party mood and he opens up his body to spatter four more, bounced just short
goes round the wicket, 88mph full toss on the stumps, clipped square for one
over the wicket, stays back and defends from the crease
goes over the infield again, length ball from Tanvir and Root simply belts it towards wide long-off for four more
on the pads and he times the ball away through square for another couple
short of a length outside off, he drops back and fiddles one more through backward point
a standing crunch from Vince, hits it straight to Afridi at mid-off but his long barrier springs a leak and they pick up two
four more, drilled through midwicket! Skipped forward to a full delivery and sent it rasping past the fielder on the edge of the ring
loopy legbreak on off stump and defended from the crease
sliding on towards leg stump, flicked away to the leg for a single
tossed up, Vince swings the arms but gets a bottom edge down on to the pitch
angled in, slightly short and pulled through midwicket
goes for the big shot, and bowled him leg stump! Root aimed a hefty blow across the line but the ball dipped and skidded under the bat to hit the timber

starman strikes again! Afridi points the skies after taking a return catch! The ball was short and Moeen was right to give it some tap but his baseball slog came off the toe of the bat straight back to the bowler. Two in two for Pakistan's captain, bringing his side right back into it
slightly short and down the leg side and it deflects away off Vince's pads as he plays across the line
back of a length, shuffles across and defends on off
on the stumps, worked to the leg side from the crease
slanted across the left-hander from over the wicket, stabbed towards point
Morgan drops back and punches to the right of the bowler, who goes scrambling after it, mid-off is also there to prevent a run
on the pads, Morgan tucks it behind square and gets back for a second, off the mark
flighted on off stump, Vince calmly turns the bat and works one through midwicket, the showman thwarted
comes forward and punches one down the ground
drops a little short, width for Vince to swing the arms and crack a cut through the covers, there's a man out there
drops back outside off and dabs the ball late towards short third man, Vince has to dive but he beats the direct hit
turned off the pads
drops a little short, Morgan hops back and slams a pull through square leg
short from Anwar and brutalised over long-on for six! Morgan pounces on a short ball, takes a couple of steps and swings it lustily beyond the ropes
pushed across outside off, Morgan dabs it through backward point
shortish, backs away and pulls a single to long-on
Morgan advances again and it's a good response from Anwar, digs it in even shorter, at the batsman and he has to take evasive action
launched over midwicket again, powerful cross-batted shot into space, between two fielders for a couple
pushed across on a length, Morgan steers it through the covers

bowled him, turned past the defensive shot to hit middle and leg! Another first-ball wicket, Malik pumps his arms in delight... That was almost identical to Morgan's dismissal in the third ODI, on this ground, tossed up and straightening
over the wicket, flighted around off stump and he attempts to reverse sweep, turns him to hit him on the thigh
goes back and flicks one away on the leg side
angled on the pads, must have flicked a strap on its away behind the legs, Rizwan taking it but no wide
drops into the crease and tucks a single to square leg
on the stumps, Buttler works the ball through the leg side
a big lbw appeal from Malik, the batsman coming forward and playing around the ball, hit on the knee flap... deflects away and Vince survives, might have been high
short outside off, flat-footed swing and a miss
back of a length outside off and swatted away through the covers for a couple

Vince pulls and the ball loops up off the glove, behind square and Buttler calls for a quick single... but he's beaten by a direct hit from Rizwan! Pakistan have another, they're running around cock-a-hoop. Buttler dived full length but Rizwan reacted so quickly he was a foot away from being in
past the outside edge, big appeal...! A brilliantly executed cutter from Irfan, don't think it flicked the bat, though
goes back and across and runs a single through backward point
well bowled again, cuts his fingers over it again, there's visible deviation as Vince pokes forward and misses
tossed up and turned to the leg side
goes inside out, lofted over extra cover, it's got more height than distance but lands safely
googly, I think, down the leg side, maybe flicked the pad again
outside off, goes back and dabs the ball to short third man
on the stumps and flicked into to the leg side
skidding on with the arm, topspinner from Afridi and Billings gets a bit of inside edge on it before the ball thumps the pads
gives it some air, comes forward and punches one to long-off
shortish outside off, Billings runs the ball towards backward point
drops short and Billings spanks a pull to midwicket, such fast hands and he gets it into a gap

wafts across the line, top-edged into the night sky... and it's brilliantly taken by Umar Akmal running back towards midwicket! Actually, it was somewhat flukily taken, the ball popping out of the hands but he managed to cradle it against his shoulder and hold on. Pakistan all over England
Vince is on strike and he picks a slower ball, chops it through backward point for a couple
good length outside off, punched back towards mid-off
on the stumps, maybe a fraction slower, clipped to midwicket
tossed up on the stumps, Woakes pushes his first ball through mid-on
length ball, spinning in and defended from the crease
Vince makes an early move forwards and Malik draws his length ball, might have been on for a leg-side stumps if it hadn't have flicked the pad and squirted to short fine leg
tossed up, goes down low and sweeps one through square leg
spinning down the leg side
flighted, looking to turn to leg, the ball spins on to the pad and deflects to the off side
Woakes stays back and taps another single behind square
back of a length, steered towards backward point
on the stumps, Woakes shows it a straight bat in defence
hammered over cover and away, Woakes took half a step back, opened up his body and carved a length ball to the boundary
pitched up and driven out towards the deep cover fielder
slower-ball bouncer, totally foxed Vince, who hung his bat out forlornly as it sailed through... but the umpires decide it was wide on height, which seems a fair call from the replays
goes round the wicket, full on leg stump, clipped through midwicket
another cutter, down the leg side and flicked fine for one more
googly, down the leg side and turned to short fine leg
flat legbreak, outside off, punched through the off side
pushed through the covers, they think about a second but the fielder comes dashing in off the fence
on the stumps, Woakes works into a gap at midwicket
pushed through quickly outside off, gets low to stab a drive out towards deep extra cover
some turn for the Afridi legbreak, must be a dry pitch, Woakes spoons a cut safely through point
back of a length, possibly a cutter, steps out to swing and miss
makes room, picks a full ball and lofts a majestic inside-out drive beyond the boundary, England's third six of the innings - takes the to Nelson
slower ball from Irfan, bunted down the ground and they hustle two
this is a slower cutter from Irfan, it actually spins away from the batsman to be called wide
length ball, punched through the covers
pitched up towards the blockhole, Vince digs one more out to long-on
takes the pace off, Woakes heaves at it and top-edges down towards third man... but it's dropped! There were three men converging on it, Anwar was the butterfingered culprit, I think
length ball, clears the front leg and smashed out of the ground! Think we might have lost the ball, he really gave it some humpty and it goes miles
pitched up and Woakes slaps a full toss to backward point, Tanvir stops it and hurts his hand in the process
fires this one down the leg side, Rizwan does well to stop it
full and wide, Vince was backing away and could only chop down on it with the toe of the bat
full again, Vince can't get under it, driven back into the stumps at the other end and they take one
into the crowd again, Woakes is cleaning up here! It was full and wide, only just within reach but he flayed a lofted drive for a third six - he's overtaken Vince with that shot
goes full on leg stump and Woakes whips it away through square leg for one more - 16 off the over, just England England's doctor prescribed
length outside off, lofted into space at cover point, they scurry back for a second
pitched up and cracked out towards deep cover - that's the 50 stand between these two, from 29 balls, with Vince contributing just 8
steps back into the crease and sweep/pulls through backward square, the fielder can't cut it off and that's a welcome boundary for Vince, just his second
full and wide, swings and misses
length outside off, Vince goes across and tries to ramp the ball fine, it flicks the pad and diverts into Rizwan's gloves, Irfan appeals and they think better of running
clear the decks! Now Vince clears the ropes, waits on a length delivery and carts it h-i-i-i-i-i-i-g-h over the rope at deep backward square
Woakes goes for another leg-side maximum but top-edges to the fielder standing a few yards in from the boundary! The bat turned in the hands slightly and Umar Akmal took another good catch
shortish, pulled through the leg side
length ball, very wide and Willey swings wildly, gets a thick inside edge past his stumps
full toss on the stumps, Vince goes low and gets some bat on his sweep, skims away past short fine leg and that will be four - that's the England 150
slower ball and Vince holes out! He swats a pull into the hands of deep midwicket, swipes his bat angrily - seemed like a clean connection but couldn't clear the fielder
length in the channel and Willey toe-ends a pull into the leg side, they come charging back for two as the throw comes in
